Label.text: Please enter a Work Time Thru, which is greater than or equal to Work Time From.
Only one daily report can be created per day.
Daily Reports can only be created for the present or the past.
The total duration of all daily activities should be less than or equal to one day.
A new time card cannot be created while an open time card exists.
Time Entry Overlap. New Time Entry cannot be created.
Please enter Time Thru/Date Thru greater than or equal to Time From/Date From.
Please enter a valid Reason Code for Time change.
Time information overlaps with existing data.
Sorry Due to Daylight Saving Time change, the entered times are invalid. Time Entry cannot be changed.
Time Entry Overlap. Time Card cannot be released.
Time Entry Overlap between Entries #entry1# (#time1#) and #entry2# (#time2#). Time Card cannot be saved.
Time Entry Overlap between Entries #entry1# (#time1#) and #entry2# (#time2#). Time Entry cannot be edited.
Sorry the Time Entry #entry# (#time#) is outside working time.
Sorry the Time Entry #entry# (#time#) is outside working time. The Time Card cannot be released.
